column4: I'm trying to install a program that came as a .gz file, and it has folders named 'usr' 'lib' 'etc' and I guess I should place those files into adequate folders
Does it have an install file?
It's somewhat unlikely that you should have to do that stuff manually.
And if you absolutely insist on doing it by hand, put them in /usr/local/lib, /usr/local/bin, instead.
